description.raw:
This pull request has two main aspects:

- Add time to contacts message (note contacts message contains multiple contact messages). This serves as a timestamp for contact sensor readings.

- Fix a bug [(part of Issue 141)](#!/osrf/gazebo/issue/141) with contact sensor where it was continuing to send messages even after losing contact with an object.

Two minor things:

- Add a comment about contactFeedbackIndex

- Prevent ODEPhysics from sending empty contacts messages
description.html:
This pull request has two main aspects:

  • Add time to contacts message (note contacts message contains multiple contact messages). This serves as a timestamp for contact sensor readings.

  • Fix a bug (part of Issue 141) with contact sensor where it was continuing to send messages even after losing contact with an object.

Two minor things:

  • Add a comment about contactFeedbackIndex

  • Prevent ODEPhysics from sending empty contacts messages

title.raw: Time in contacts message, another contact sensor fix
title.html: Time in contacts message, another contact sensor fix
